Beginning Interaction in Processing

10 September 2010

Simple experiments with mouse and keyboard input in Processing.

In this sketch a line is drawn following the path of your mouse, and the stroke width of the line is based on mouse speed.

Download the sketch.

Typing

Display the text that I type.

Download the sketch.
